title.narrative: JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: By 2020, children, especially the most vulnerable, have access to a child - friendly justice system which adequately responds to children's violation of rights and ensures fair, timely and effective solutions, which contributes to Access To Justice, Justice For Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, all children benefit from strengthened accountability for child rights implementation through the establishment of effective child rights monitoring mechanisms and improved access to justice

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, children, especially the most vulnerable, have access to a child - friendly justice system which adequately responds tochildren?s violation of rights and ensures fair, timely and effective solutions

description.narrative: With UNICEF support, further progress was made in implementation of the Juvenile Justice Code, capacity building and specialization of justice professionals and expansion of child-friendly approach to civil and administrative legal proceedings. | Status:Met | As-of Date:15/01/2021

title.narrative: Existence of specialized justice for children systems, such as capacity building and standards-setting within criminal and civil justice systems, Text

target.value: 2021:Specialization standards for civil justice professionals developed

actual.value: 2020:Ordinance for specialization of professionals from the criminal justice system adopted, training programmes institutionalized. Child Rights Code provides for extension of justice for children approach to civil justice system
